verses.verse: "Then it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and you <S%H3423>possess<s%> it and <S%H3427>live<s%> in it,

that you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in from your <S%H776>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> [it] in a <S%H2935>basket<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7931>establish<s%> His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in office at that <S%H3117>time,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'I <S%H5046>declare<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> that I have <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to our fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> us.'

"Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2935>basket<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> it <S%H5117>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> 'My father was a wandering <S%H1>Aramean,<s%> and he <S%H6>went<s%> <S%H761>down<s%> to <S%H3381>Egypt<s%> and <S%H3381>sojourned<s%> <S%H4714>there,<s%> <S%H1481>few<s%> in <S%H8033>number;<s%> but <S%H4592>there<s%> he <S%H4962>became<s%> a <S%H8033>great,<s%> <S%H1961>mighty<s%> and <S%H1419>populous<s%> <S%H6099>nation.<s%>
'And the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7489>treated<s%> us <S%H7489>harshly<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> us, and <S%H5414>imposed<s%> <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>labor<s%> on us.

'Then we <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our fathers, and the <S%H1>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>heard<s%> our <S%H8085>voice<s%> and <S%H6963>saw<s%> our <S%H7200>affliction<s%> and our <S%H6040>toil<s%> and our <S%H5999>oppression;<s%>

and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror<s%> and with <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders;<s%>

and He has <S%H935>brought<s%> us to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> us <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

'And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> hast <S%H5414>given<s%> me.' And you shall <S%H5117>set<s%> it <S%H5117>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%>

and you and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you and your <S%H1004>household.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you have <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H6237>paying<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H8393>increase<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4643>tithing,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> to the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> to the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and to the <S%H490>widow,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> in your <S%H8179>towns,<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> 'I have <S%H1197>removed<s%> the <S%H6944>sacred<s%> [portion] from [my] <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me; I have not <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> or <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of Thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

'I have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> of it while <S%H205>mourning,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have I <S%H1197>removed<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it while I was <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>offered<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it to the <S%H4191>dead.<s%> I have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that Thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

<S%H8259>'Look<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> from Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation,<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> us, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> as Thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> to our fathers.'

<S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commands<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%> You shall therefore be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

"You have <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H559>declared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to be your <S%H430>God,<s%> and that you would <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to His <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H559>declared<s%> you to be His <S%H5971>people,<s%> a <S%H5459>treasured<s%> <S%H5459>possession,<s%> as He <S%H1696>promised<s%> you, and that you should <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

and that He shall <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H6213>made,<s%> for <S%H8416>praise,<s%> <S%H8034>fame,<s%> and <S%H8597>honor;<s%> and that you shall be a <S%H6918>consecrated<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as He has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> "
